name: com.heathen.steamworksfoundation
description: A powerful set of tools, systems and editor extensions to make you integration with the Steam API easier, faster, and more robust. Make the most of Steam for your game!

samples.description: A simple bare bones example with instructions of a from-scratch setup.
Reading and using user data such as avatar, name, nickname, level, status and more.
Demonstration of the configuration and use of Steam stats and achievements.
